features.name: DamageResistances
features.description: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

features.name: Earth Glide
features.description: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

features.name: Siege Monster
features.description: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
